remarks: There is a vector that is outside the span of 2 others.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2015.)
statement:
dvh3dim.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvh3dim.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvh3dim.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dvh3dim.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dvh3dim.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dvh3dim.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dvh3dim.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
dvh3dim $p |- ( ph -> E. z e. V -. z e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) $.

$d U z $.
